citations.narrative:
At the time of the inspection, the licensee did not have a documented contingency plan for the facility. If an emergency or
natural disaster were to occur at the facility, the lack of a written contingency plan could impact animal health if the staff
are not prepared to respond to the situation appropriately. Exhibitors must develop, document, and follow an appropriate
contingency plan in the event of an emergency or disaster.
CORRECT BY: October 21, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.134(a) 
   
Contingency planning. 
At the time of the inspection, the licensee did not have a documented contingency plan for the facility. If an emergency or 
natural disaster were to occur at the facility, the lack of a written contingency plan could impact animal health if the staff 
are not prepared to respond to the situation appropriately. Exhibitors must develop, document, and follow an appropriate 
contingency plan in the event of an emergency or disaster. 
CORRECT BY: October 21, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
